title: About sub pages
body:
This pull request introduces significant updates across the backend and frontend, including rebranding, API documentation enhancements, UI improvements, and codebase refactoring. Below is a summary of the most important changes grouped by theme.

### Backend Updates
* **Rebranding**: The API name was updated from "Tradi API" to "Esusu API" in the index route response (`api/app/__init__.py`).
* **API Documentation**: Comprehensive documentation was added for the Esusu Fiat Exchange API, detailing endpoints, request/response formats, and usage examples (`api/doc.md`).

### Frontend Updates
#### Blog Section
* **File Restructure**: The `blogs` page was renamed from `blogs.tsx` to `blogs/page.tsx` and updated to use a default export function. Post dates were also updated to reflect the year 2025 (`frontend/app/blogs/page.tsx`). [[1]](diffhunk://#diff-5ca7a16e327f0bc39cf393689c7d973570cf07437b61c842e523d54de1fa8367L20-R20) [[2]](diffhunk://#diff-5ca7a16e327f0bc39cf393689c7d973570cf07437b61c842e523d54de1fa8367L29-R29) [[3]](diffhunk://#diff-5ca7a16e327f0bc39cf393689c7d973570cf07437b61c842e523d54de1fa8367L38-R44) [[4]](diffhunk://#diff-5ca7a16e327f0bc39cf393689c7d973570cf07437b61c842e523d54de1fa8367L79-R80)

#### Contact Section
* **File Restructure**: The `contact` page was renamed from `contact.tsx` to `contact/page.tsx` and refactored to use a default export function. Placeholder images and fallback logic were replaced with a direct image source (`frontend/app/contact/page.tsx`). [[1]](diffhunk://#diff-95d7b0b9fe8868d5703d10dbd7b5364d0a7f8d0725ec88e881235c6fade31025R1-R2) [[2]](diffhunk://#diff-95d7b0b9fe8868d5703d10dbd7b5364d0a7f8d0725ec88e881235c6fade31025L12-R14) [[3]](diffhunk://#diff-95d7b0b9fe8868d5703d10dbd7b5364d0a7f8d0725ec88e881235c6fade31025L43-L50) [[4]](diffhunk://#diff-95d7b0b9fe8868d5703d10dbd7b5364d0a7f8d0725ec88e881235c6fade31025L152-R151) [[5]](diffhunk://#diff-95d7b0b9fe8868d5703d10dbd7b5364d0a7f8d0725ec88e881235c6fade31025L236-R235)

#### FAQ Section
* **File Restructure**: The `faq` page was renamed from `faq.tsx` to `faq/page.tsx`. FAQ content was updated to reflect Esusu's financial services, replacing generic placeholder text (`frontend/app/faq/page.tsx`). [[1]](diffhunk://#diff-b16c19af3462cad545faeb8d346de1a1841246b137853911fd6c75c8bb1a4a44R1-R2) [[2]](diffhunk://#diff-b16c19af3462cad545faeb8d346de1a1841246b137853911fd6c75c8bb1a4a44L11-R34) [[3]](diffhunk://#diff-b16c19af3462cad545faeb8d346de1a1841246b137853911fd6c75c8bb1a4a44L46-R48) [[4]](diffhunk://#diff-b16c19af3462cad545faeb8d346de1a1841246b137853911fd6c75c8bb1a4a44L60-R62)

#### Layout Refactoring
* **Theme Management**: Removed custom theme management logic and replaced it with a `ThemeProvider` component. This simplifies the code and leverages a centralized theme handling mechanism (`frontend/app/layout.tsx`). [[1]](diffhunk://#diff-ccddbfb0d0537ee9a04df26462300003e5c30b9f0a212393cdcce2d30d2bd931L1-L60) [[2]](diffhunk://#diff-ccddbfb0d0537ee9a04df26462300003e5c30b9f0a212393cdcce2d30d2bd931L70-R30)

title: Minor UI fixes
body:
This pull request includes updates to the `UtilityBills` page and the `CreateCampaignDialog` component to improve UI consistency and remove unused functionality. Key changes include styling updates for buttons and dialog elements, text adjustments for clarity, and the removal of a wallet connection function.

### UI Improvements:
* [`frontend/app/utilityBills/page.tsx`](diffhunk://#diff-8190c063d1ae2bc038a84f3c9a4b6a9d2499ea33e764d1f42a7c7d80d636dc38L32-R40): Adjusted `TabsList` to include a `gap-1` class for better spacing between tabs and shortened tab labels for clarity.
* [`frontend/components/thrift/CreateCampaignDialog.tsx`](diffhunk://#diff-86f51ac0430e23f3fa480afd400edb62cc8e38c4f202ba67b03489a6ea77fc67L96-R85): Updated dialog content with a `dark:text-white` class and rounded corners for improved appearance.
* [`frontend/components/thrift/CreateCampaignDialog.tsx`](diffhunk://#diff-86f51ac0430e23f3fa480afd400edb62cc8e38c4f202ba67b03489a6ea77fc67L105-R94): Modified button styles to include rounded corners and dark mode support [[1]](diffhunk://#diff-86f51ac0430e23f3fa480afd400edb62cc8e38c4f202ba67b03489a6ea77fc67L105-R94) [[2]](diffhunk://#diff-86f51ac0430e23f3fa480afd400edb62cc8e38c4f202ba67b03489a6ea77fc67L155-R152).

### Code Cleanup:
* [`frontend/components/thrift/CreateCampaignDialog.tsx`](diffhunk://#diff-86f51ac0430e23f3fa480afd400edb62cc8e38c4f202ba67b03489a6ea77fc67L73-L83): Removed the unused `connectWallet` function, simplifying the component.

title: Test
body:
This pull request refactors the currency conversion logic and improves code maintainability by centralizing API calls and simplifying components. The most significant changes include introducing a reusable `convert` function for fetching exchange rates, removing redundant API routes, and updating currency conversion utilities to use the new centralized logic.

### Refactoring and Centralization of Exchange Rate Logic:
* Introduced a new `convert` function in `frontend/app/api/exchange_rate/index.ts` to handle exchange rate API calls, consolidating logic for fetching rates and error handling.
* Removed the redundant `POST` API route in `frontend/app/api/exchange_rate/route.ts`, as its functionality has been replaced by the new `convert` function.

### Updates to Currency Utilities:
* Refactored `convertNairaToUSD` and `convertUSDToNaira` functions in `frontend/utils/currency.ts` to use the new `fetchExchangeRate` helper, simplifying the logic and improving maintainability. [[1]](diffhunk://#diff-5daea379e9a870c4c2ee101014fa1f1d48d7dd8a4008a750603736917ffa4c8dR15-R36) [[2]](diffhunk://#diff-5daea379e9a870c4c2ee101014fa1f1d48d7dd8a4008a750603736917ffa4c8dL48-R51)
* Updated dependent functions like `displayDualPrice` and `calculateTransactionTotal` to align with the refactored currency conversion logic. [[1]](diffhunk://#diff-5daea379e9a870c4c2ee101014fa1f1d48d7dd8a4008a750603736917ffa4c8dL75-R62) [[2]](diffhunk://#diff-5daea379e9a870c4c2ee101014fa1f1d48d7dd8a4008a750603736917ffa4c8dL109-R96)

### Minor Improvements:
* Updated the `useParams` usage in `frontend/app/thrift/join/[id]/page.tsx` to handle potential undefined values gracefully. ([frontend/app/thrift/join/[id]/page.tsxL7-R8](diffhunk://#diff-93cd0b28b02fa36a23a1608f2d20daa04a7071c8ced07c938b02b74fc073f58cL7-R8))
* Fixed a missing dependency in the `useEffect` hook in `frontend/components/Header.tsx` to ensure proper reactivity.

title: fix: api return data fixed
body:
This pull request introduces a new endpoint for fetching stock data, refactors the existing exchange rate endpoint, and adds a configuration system for the application. The changes enhance functionality, improve code organization, and prepare the application for different environments.

### New Features:
* Added a `/api/stock-data` endpoint to fetch and format stock data for frontend charting. This includes support for parameters like `symbol`, `timeframe`, and `interval`. (`api/app/routes/api.py`, `api/app/__init__.py`) [[1]](diffhunk://#diff-e2205266e472e8ea480021c82a99bd7f041256a7d70c4db06aee27e023eab1ebL43-R44) [[2]](diffhunk://#diff-b94aea758bf8e0bd866cb0dbccce7db109998d1950a6923c1e07ec7700e9aa30R9) [[3]](diffhunk://#diff-b94aea758bf8e0bd866cb0dbccce7db109998d1950a6923c1e07ec7700e9aa30L23-R96)

### Refactoring and Enhancements:
* Refactored the `/api/exchange-rate` endpoint to simplify parameter handling and improve error handling. Default values for `base_currency` were updated to `USD`. (`api/app/routes/api.py`)
* Improved the `fetch_exchange_rate` function to align with the new structure and added a new `fetch_stock_data` function to handle stock data retrieval. (`api/app/utils/rate.py`)

### Configuration System:
* Introduced a configuration system with `Config` classes for production, development, and testing environments. This includes settings for `SECRET_KEY`, `DEBUG`, and `DATABASE_URI`. (`api/config.py`)

title: fix: changes to exchange rate api
body:
This pull request introduces several updates to the `api` project, including improvements to the exchange rate functionality, cleanup of unused configurations, and updates to logging and application startup behavior. The most important changes are grouped below by theme.

### Exchange rate functionality improvements:
* Updated the route for the `exchange_rate_endpoint` to support `OPTIONS` requests and modified default symbols for both `POST` and `GET` methods to use `GHC` instead of `NGN` or `NVDA`.
* Enhanced the `fetch_exchange_rate` function in `api/app/utils/rate.py` to include fallback options, reduced the timeframe for data fetching, and simplified the return format to include only the rate and timestamp. Removed retry logic and replaced it with a more streamlined implementation.
* Updated the `exchange_rate_endpoint` function to use the improved `fetch_exchange_rate` function, added logging for fetched rate data, and included a warning in the response if present.

### Configuration and startup updates:
* Removed the `Config` class and its environment-based configurations from `api/config.py`, simplifying the codebase.
* Updated the application startup logging to reflect the new application name (`Esusu Exchange Rate API`) and removed redundant debug mode settings in `api/main.py`.

### Code cleanup:
* Removed duplicate `import traceback` in `api/app/routes/api.py`.
* Disabled debug mode in `api/app/main.py` by setting `debug=False` in the `app.run()` call.

title: Thrift Utility bills and API setup
body:
# Esusu Application Major Update

## ✅ Key Implementations
- ✅ Created utility bill payment infrastructure
- ✅ Added real-time chat functionality with floating component
- ✅ Built backend API routes and utilities

## ✅ Infrastructure Improvements
- ✅ Configured folder structure for maintainability
- ✅ Added test mocks for frontend components
- ✅ Integrated rate calculation utilities

## ✅ Quality Assurance
- ✅ Tested critical flows (thrift operations, MiniSafe transactions)
- ✅ Ensured responsive design across screen sizes
- ✅ Optimized API response handling with JSON utilities

title: fix: resolve syntax error from utility-bills branch
feat(ui): Implement Shadcn/UI components across the application
body:
# Modern UI Update with Shadcn/UI

This PR implements a comprehensive update to modernize our application UI using Shadcn/UI components and consistent design patterns.

## Key Changes

- **Homepage**: Added quick action cards, improved layout, and implemented tabbed content sections
- **Balance Component**: Redesigned with glass morphism and status indicators
- **MiniSafe**: Complete redesign with tabs for deposit/withdraw/break lock operations
- **Thrift & Utility Bills**: Added "Coming Soon" placeholders for in-development features
- **Transaction List**: Enhanced with modern tabbed view and improved transaction display
- **Contact Form**: Created new responsive design with multiple contact options

## Design Improvements

- Implemented glass morphism design language across all components
- Removed shadows in favor of subtle borders and opacity changes
- Added consistent spacing, typography, and color usage
- Enhanced motion animations for improved user experience
- Created consistent card designs, buttons, and form elements

## Technical Improvements

- Integrated all Shadcn/UI components (Card, Button, Tabs, etc.)
- Added proper loading states and skeletons
- Improved responsive behavior across all screen sizes
- Enhanced accessibility with proper labels and focus states
- Maintained component separation for better maintainability


## Testing

- Tested on Firefox
- Verified responsive behavior on mobile, tablet, and desktop
- Checked dark/light mode compatibility

## Next Steps

- Add unit tests for new components
- Implement remaining features behind feature flags
- Update documentation with new component usage
